div.p: I Beg to hand you the Inclosed account for Tools which were my own property, were used by me for the Bot Gardens and which were stolen from the Engine house on the night that it was Broken into in the beginning of March, and request the favour of a speedy Settlement

div.p:
South Yarra
On 10 May M noted on the verso of the MS: 'To ascertain from E. Soues the price or value of these implements'; the text that follows is on a separate sheet, presumably supplied in response to M's query to replace an earlier 'inclosed account'. check file at PRO
Approval to pay the claim was sought in M to J. McCulloch, 10 May 1870.
